controlinterface.swinguiadvanced.control

Class ComponentManagementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controlinterface.swinguiadvanced.control.ComponentManagementController

  • public class ComponentManagementController
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for managing other components (control interfaces and modules).
    Author:
    Stefan Werner
